handBlock.header: With you every step of the way
handBlock.text: From your first crypto trade to your first NFT purchase, you''ll have us to guide you through the process. No stupid questions. No sleepless nights.

1.question: What products does HAX provide?
1.answer: Founded in 2017, HAX is a Seychelles-registered cryptocurrency exchange that adopts blockchain technology to build the next-generation financial ecosystem. We provide the latest trading services for hundreds of diverse crypto assets.

2.question: How do I buy Bitcoin on HAX?

6.question: How to trade crypto on HAX

1.title: Seamless Cross-Chain Swaps
1.description: Easily and securely move and convert assets across all major blockchains with our platform. Our solution allows for smooth and reliable transfer of digital assets, providing flexible access to a variety of blockchains.

hero.label: Anytime, Anywhere
hero.description: By staking assets, you not only grow your portfolio, but also help secure blockchain networks.

imageBlock.header: Unlock the power of Liquid Staking
imageBlock.text: Get yields securely, equally and transparently at best rates on the market. Keep access to your staked asset at all times. Deposit TON, we'll do the rest.

rocketBlock.header: Name is Secure to the Core

messageBlock.message: We want everyone to get rewards for participating in blockchain security

stepsBlock.header: How to Get Yields from TON Using Name

1.title: Deposit TON
1.text: Deposit the desired amount of TON coins you want to stake on the platform.

2.title: Receive tsTON
2.text: Receive tsTON tokens, which represent share in the TON pool.

3.title: Earn Rewards
3.text: With your staking asset while using liquid token for other purposes.

4.title: Withdraw
4.text: Just exchange anytime your tsTON tokens back for TON coins with the accumulated yield.
